description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. A great conflict awaits you and your Avatar. Challenge yourself and your friends in this purest test of skill. Includes online play and the Official JForce Seal of Quality. http://jforcegames.com
